name: Gryphon Networks
overview:
Complete Contact Governance. Total Marketing intelligence. In today’s saturated marketplace, consumers demand control of what they want to know about, when they want to find out about it, and by what channel they want to hear about it. Regulators and consumers alike want marketers to pay attention. Gryphon has the only centralized and secure cloud-based solution that helps direct marketers grow their marketable universe and increase revenue while honoring consumer choice.

The Core Equation: Compliance + Preference + Productivity = Revenue The central equation that unlocks your marketable universe, the Gryphon Coreâ„¢ guarantees fully compliant, multichannel access to new prospects and current customers, granular and revenue-generating insight into consumer preference, and flexible and actionable reporting on sales productivity goals.

The Gryphon Core: Guarantees 100% compliance with complex DNC regulations Increases your marketable universe by up to 60% Manages customer preferences across all channels in real time Curbs the over-suppression of valuable prospect lists Improves customer/prospect satisfaction and loyalty Reduces costs compared to in-house solutions Integrates with existing systems for maximum efficiency Offers cloud-based command and control via client portal Provides 24 x 7 x 365 real-time client access Gryphon Core Layers: Purpose-built for growth: Designed for accessibility and scalability, Gryphon Core Layers help you select the level of contact governance that suits your needs today, with an eye toward growth tomorrow.

Gryphon Core Privacy Layer The purpose-built compliance management platform that masters global phone, email, text, mail, and fax marketing privacy regulations and relationship marketing opportunities.

Gryphon Core Market Advantage Layer Creates marketplace advantage by providing full compliance, granular preference and actionable productivity solutions.

funding_rounds.source_description: Gryphon Networks raises $7M in VC funds
